name: Origin Unknown
description:
Investigate the recently condemned High Rock Hotel in this mystery horror expedition. As Lin Wei, a woman who can turn just about anything into a weapon, you will uncover the disappearance of your father.

It has been a week since Lin has last heard from her father, the only thing she has left of his is a letter postmarked from his last known location - The High Rock Hotel - and his walkie-talkie. With her, she brings her transformed camera which she has turned into an electrical killer beam of deadly destruction.

The High Rock Hotel should be desolate, the halls ringing with silence, but something strange is lurking within its depths. At every turn, terrifying monsters will stalk your every step.

Lin will need to evade threats, use careful foresight when her weapon - the Polaris - needs to recharge, and piece together the mystery her father left her in his journal. From there, Lin will go on an adventure discovering cassette tapes and begin unravelling the mystery of the disappearances at the High Rock Hotel.
